text: Adair is a name of Scottish and Irish origin that can be used for both boys and girls. ==Origin== Adair comes from the Gaelic word adaire, which means "oak tree". In Celtic mythology, the oak tree symbolizes strength, wisdom, and endurance, making Adair a powerful and meaningful name for your baby. == People == * Adair Blain (1894â€“1983), Australian politician * Adair Ford Boroughs (born 1979/1980), American lawyer and politician * Adair Cardoso (born 1993), Brazilian singer and composer ==References== Category:Names
title: Adair
